trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can render images that indicate the intensities of the magenta, yellow, and black channels.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte kan det føre til bilder som angir intensitetene magenta, gul og svarte kanaler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi en output-kanal for standardkategori og en annen utdatakanal for kategorien punktgrafikk.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien punktgrafikk, gjelder standardinnstillingene punktgrafikk-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en farge justering eller gråtonebakgrunn-innstillingen for en bestemt kategori, gjelder ikke lenger justering standardinnstillingene til denne kategorien.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Anta at du angir en samling av justeringsinnstillinger for standardkategori.

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetOutputChannel method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir utdatakanal for kategorien punktgrafikk ved å sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>til metoden SetOutputChannel Ingen justering standardinnstillingene gjelder punktgrafikk.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag"></xref> that specifies the output channel.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag"> </xref> som angir utdatakanalen for.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the output channel is set.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> som angir kategorien utdatakanalen angis.

trans-unit.source: Sets the output channel color-profile file for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Angir kanal-profilen utdatafilen for standardkategorien.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>metoder for å konvertere et bilde til et fargeområde CMYK (-magenta-JPG), og Undersøk intensitetene av en av CMYK farge kanaler.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: Sett du skriver kode som utfører følgende: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>til den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>

trans-unit.source: Pass the path name of a color profile file to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Sende banenavnet for en fargefil til den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass the paths of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Sende baner for den <xref:System.Drawing.Image>og <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekter til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]bruker filen for profilen til å beregne cyan-komponenten for hver pikselbredden på bildet, og hver pikselbredden på det gjengitte bildet blir en skygge av grått som angir intensiteten i den cyan kanalen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel color-profile file for the default category and a different output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi en output kanal for-fil for standardkategori og en annen kanal-profilen utdatafilen for punktgrafikk-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien punktgrafikk, gjelder standardinnstillingene punktgrafikk-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The path name of a color-profile file.
trans-unit.target: Banenavnet for en farge-fil.

trans-unit.source: If the color-profile file is in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color directory, this parameter can be the file name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen for profilen er i mappen %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color, vil denne parameteren kan være filnavnet.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this parameter must be the fully qualified path name.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren må ellers være fullstendige banenavnet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the output channel color-profile file for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: Angir kanal-profilen utdatafilen for en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>og <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>metoder for å konvertere et bilde til et fargeområde CMYK (-magenta-JPG), og Undersøk intensitetene av en av CMYK farge kanaler.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: Sett du skriver kode som utfører følgende: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>til den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>

trans-unit.source: Pass the path name of a color profile file to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Sende banenavnet for en fargefil til den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass the paths of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Sende baner for den <xref:System.Drawing.Image>og <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekter til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]bruker filen for profilen til å beregne cyan-komponenten for hver pikselbredden på bildet, og hver pikselbredden på det gjengitte bildet blir en skygge av grått som angir intensiteten i den cyan kanalen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel color-profile file for the default category and a different output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi en output kanal for-fil for standardkategori og en annen kanal-profilen utdatafilen for punktgrafikk-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien punktgrafikk, gjelder standardinnstillingene punktgrafikk-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en farge justering eller gråtonebakgrunn-innstillingen for en bestemt kategori, gjelder ikke lenger justering standardinnstillingene til denne kategorien.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Anta at du angir en samling av justeringsinnstillinger for standardkategori.

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir kanal-profilen utdatafilen for kategorien punktgrafikk ved å sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>til den <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>metoden Ingen justering standardinnstillingene gjelder punktgrafikk.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The path name of a color-profile file.
trans-unit.target: Banenavnet for en farge-fil.

trans-unit.source: If the color-profile file is in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color directory, this parameter can be the file name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen for profilen er i mappen %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color, vil denne parameteren kan være filnavnet.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this parameter must be the fully qualified path name.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren må ellers være fullstendige banenavnet.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the output channel color-profile file is set.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> som angir kategorien av kanalen-profilen filen angis.

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Angir fargen tilordner tabellen for standardkategorien.

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: En farge tilordner tabell er en matrise av <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>strukturer.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>har to <xref:System.Drawing.Color>objekter: én som angir en farge for gamle og én som angir en tilsvarende ny farge.</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: Under gjengivelse endret en farge som tilsvarer en av de gamle fargene i tabellen tilordner til den tilsvarende nye fargen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi tilordner en farge for standardkategorien en farge tilordner tabell for kategorien punktgrafikk og fremdeles en annen farge-tilordner tabell for penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien penn, gjelder standardinnstillingene penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: An array of color pairs of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av farge par av typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each color pair contains an existing color (the first value) and the color that it will be mapped to (the second value).
trans-unit.target: Hvert farge-par inneholder en eksisterende farge (den første verdien) og fargen som tilordnes til (sekundverdien).

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: Angir fargen tilordner tabellen for en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: En farge tilordner tabell er en matrise av <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>strukturer.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>har to <xref:System.Drawing.Color>objekter: én som angir en farge for gamle og én som angir en tilsvarende ny farge.</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: Under gjengivelse endret en farge som tilsvarer en av de gamle fargene i tabellen tilordner til den tilsvarende nye fargen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi tilordner en farge for standardkategorien en farge tilordner tabell for kategorien punktgrafikk og fremdeles en annen farge-tilordner tabell for penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien penn, gjelder standardinnstillingene penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en farge justering eller gråtonebakgrunn-innstillingen for en bestemt kategori, gjelder ikke lenger justering standardinnstillingene til denne kategorien.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Anta at du angir en samling av justeringsinnstillinger for standardkategori.

trans-unit.source: If you set the color-remap table for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetRemapTable method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir fargen tilordner tabellen for kategorien penn ved å sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>til metoden SetRemapTable Ingen justering standardinnstillingene gjelder penner.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: An array of color pairs of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av farge par av typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each color pair contains an existing color (the first value) and the color that it will be mapped to (the second value).
trans-unit.target: Hvert farge-par inneholder en eksisterende farge (den første verdien) og fargen som tilordnes til (sekundverdien).

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color-remap table is set.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> som angir kategorien tabellen farge tilordner angis.

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Angir terskelen (gjennomsiktighet område) for standardkategori.

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: Terskelen er en verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir et møte punkt for hver fargekomponent.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Tenk deg at terskelen er satt til 0,7 og anta at du er gjengivelse av en farge som red, grønn og blå komponenter er 230 50 og 220, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: Den røde komponenten (230) er større enn 0.7x255, slik at den røde komponenten vil bli endret til 255 (full intensiteten).

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: Den grønne komponenten (50) er mindre enn 0.7x255, slik at den grønne komponenten vil bli endret til 0.

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten blue (220) er større enn 0.7x255, slik at komponenten blue vil bli endret til 255.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi en grense for standardkategorien en grense for kategorien punktgrafikk og fremdeles en annen terskelen for penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien penn, gjelder standardinnstillingene penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: A real number that specifies the threshold value.
trans-unit.target: Et reelt tall som angir terskelverdien.

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: Angir terskelen (gjennomsiktighet område) for en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: Terskelen er en verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir et møte punkt for hver fargekomponent.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Tenk deg at terskelen er satt til 0,7 og anta at du er gjengivelse av en farge som red, grønn og blå komponenter er 230 50 og 220, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: Den røde komponenten (230) er større enn 0.7x255, slik at den røde komponenten vil bli endret til 255 (full intensiteten).

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: Den grønne komponenten (50) er mindre enn 0.7x255, slik at den grønne komponenten vil bli endret til 0.

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten blue (220) er større enn 0.7x255, slik at komponenten blue vil bli endret til 255.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>objekt beholder farge og gråtonebakgrunn innstillinger for fem justering kategorier: standard punktgrafikk, velgeren, penn og tekst.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi en grense for standardkategorien en grense for kategorien punktgrafikk og fremdeles en annen terskelen for penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: Standard-justering og gråtonebakgrunn justering innstillingene gjelder for alle kategorier som ikke har justeringsinnstillinger for av sine egne.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du aldri angir justeringsinnstillinger for kategorien penn, gjelder standardinnstillingene penn-kategorien.

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en farge justering eller gråtonebakgrunn-innstillingen for en bestemt kategori, gjelder ikke lenger justering standardinnstillingene til denne kategorien.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: Anta at du angir en samling av justeringsinnstillinger for standardkategori.

trans-unit.source: If you set the threshold for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetThreshold method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir terskelen for kategorien penn ved å sende <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>til metoden SetThreshold Ingen justering standardinnstillingene gjelder penner.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: A threshold value from 0.0 to 1.0 that is used as a breakpoint to sort colors that will be mapped to either a maximum or a minimum value.
trans-unit.target: En terskelverdi mellom 0,0 og 1,0 som brukes som et stoppunkt til sorteringen farger som skal tilordnes til opptil eller en minimumsverdi.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color threshold is set.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> som angir kategorien for terskelen angis.

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode that is used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Angir brytingsmodus som brukes til å bestemme hvordan skal ligge et mønster på tvers av en form eller på formen grensene.

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: Et mønster er side ved side på tvers av en form å fylle ut når mønster er mindre enn den fyller formen.

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetWrapMode method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29> and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden SetWrapMode tilsvarer kaller <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>og sende <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den `color` parameteren.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Angir fargen på piksler utenfor en gjengitte bildet.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode> and the source rectangle passed to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: Denne fargen er synlig hvis parameteren modus er satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>og kilde rektangelet sendt til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>metoden er større enn selve bildet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan gjentatte kopier av et bilde brukes skal ligge et område.

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode and color used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Angir brytingsmodus og farge som brukes til å bestemme hvordan skal ligge et mønster på tvers av en form eller på formen grensene.

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: Et mønster er side ved side på tvers av en form å fylle ut når mønster er mindre enn den fyller formen.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan gjentatte kopier av et bilde brukes skal ligge et område.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object that specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"> </xref> objekt som angir fargen på piksler utenfor en gjengitte bildet.

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> and the source rectangle passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*> is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: Denne fargen er synlig hvis parameteren modus er satt til <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> og kilde rektangelet sendt til <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>er større enn selve bildet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode and color used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Angir brytingsmodus og farge som brukes til å bestemme hvordan skal ligge et mønster på tvers av en form eller på formen grensene.

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: Et mønster er side ved side på tvers av en form å fylle ut når mønster er mindre enn den fyller formen.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: Et element av <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> som angir hvordan gjentatte kopier av et bilde brukes skal ligge et område.

trans-unit.source: A color object that specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: Farge-objekt som angir fargen på piksler utenfor en gjengitte bildet.

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> and the source rectangle passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*> is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: Denne fargen er synlig hvis parameteren modus er satt til <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> og kilde rektangelet sendt til <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>er større enn selve bildet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: Set it to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Set it to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
